attributes.action: How much the UK taxpayer cost to provide security for the State Visit of Trump
attributes.additional_details:
When the Chinese leader came on a State Visit, all protests were held back from his route to the Palace.

This must have come at a great cost to the tax-payer and to the stretching of the security services.

What was this cost?
attributes.background: The UK is an open society with long-held values of welcoming immigrants and refugees from throughout the world and given that his edicts so far are in contravention of our values of justice, it is likely that his visit will provoke many demonstrations

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a Freedom of Information request here:
